channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @swordsjew The question is, are foxes roaming on it?
item.source:markdown: @swordsjew The question is, are foxes roaming on it?

item.description:
@RabbiRoss @Doc_RPS She’s an incredibly flawed “messenger.” She had a platform at the @jdforward for several years to promote the interests of workers and labor. Did she use it to that end when she could?

@RabbiRoss @Doc_RPS @jdforward I’ve confirmed she never reached out to the national Jewish organization devoted to labor, which could have easily come up with op ed ideas and writers to raise awareness of specific working class issues.

@RabbiRoss @Doc_RPS @jdforward Concern trolling Democrats on Fox News hardly constitutes labor advocacy.

@HannahLebovits As always, ask yourself: What would Tom Lehrer do?

@HannahLebovits Though he’s more of a quant guy.
item.source:markdown:
@HannahLebovits As always, ask yourself: What would Tom Lehrer do?
@HannahLebovits Though he’s more of a quant guy.

item.description:
@trekonomics Didn’t read the article, but not sure I’d count mass photo analysis as AI.

@trekonomics There’s a line in the Oreilly book on machine learning I’m reading which basically equates basic matrix math (albeit on very large matrices) with “learning.”
item.source:markdown:
@trekonomics Didn’t read the article, but not sure I’d count mass photo analysis as AI.
@trekonomics There’s a line in the Oreilly book on machine learning I’m reading which basically equates basic matrix math (albeit on very large matrices) with “learning.”

item.description: Let’s be clear on what happened here. Bibi let rabbis overrule safety professionals — and people died. https://t.co/YzZYSjxfdr

item.description: @ariella_kay Hate to break it to you, but there’s no mitzvah to be “frum.” Unlike pikuach nefesh and v’ahavta l’reacha kamocha.
item.source:markdown: @ariella_kay Hate to break it to you, but there’s no mitzvah to be “frum.” Unlike pikuach nefesh and v’ahavta l’reacha kamocha.

item.description:
@AdrianJannetta @xipteras Can I just say that this is crazy? This is better than any pre-Voyager picture of the planet.

@AdrianJannetta @xipteras I mean, it makes sense because in ‘79 a ground-based telescope couldn’t just snap 40k pictures. But still…. I’m totally amazed to see this.
item.source:markdown:
@AdrianJannetta @xipteras Can I just say that this is crazy? This is better than any pre-Voyager picture of the planet.
@AdrianJannetta @xipteras I mean, it makes sense because in ‘79 a ground-based telescope couldn’t just snap 40k pictures. But still…. I’m totally amazed to see this.

item.description:
@trekonomics Hey, Jesus suffered horrible violence, who are we to ask our rulers for less?

@trekonomics We are ruled by pre-Vatican II Catholics, loudly unapologetic for 1500 years of torture and genocide.

item.description:
Hmmm. I suspect a lot of folks in the Army had access to classified materials — and strong training in their proper handling. Interesting that there are lots of ex-military Democrats holding seats in purple congressional districts. https://t.co/qupSLAfKEH

Take Mikie Sherill, in NJ’s 11th. I know nothing about her beyond what I just read on Wikipedia. But I would guess her military roles outlined there involved classified data.

Her Republican opponent is a lawyer and ex-prosecutor. What is his position on mishandling classified information? Seems like a useful wedge issue for a Democrat in that race.
item.source:markdown:
Hmmm. I suspect a lot of folks in the Army had access to classified materials — and strong training in their proper handling. Interesting that there are lots of ex-military Democrats holding seats in purple congressional districts. https://t.co/qupSLAfKEH
Take Mikie Sherill, in NJ’s 11th. I know nothing about her beyond what I just read on Wikipedia. But I would guess her military roles outlined there involved classified data.
Her Republican opponent is a lawyer and ex-prosecutor. What is his position on mishandling classified information? Seems like a useful wedge issue for a Democrat in that race.
